src: "Mayda na kita yana 4-ka-bulan-an edad nga yatot nga diri-diabetic nga han hadto diabetic," dugang pa niya.
mt: "We now have a four-month-old baby who is not diabetic but was diabetic," she added.
ref: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.

src: Ginpahimatngon ni Dr. Ehud Ur, propesor han medisina ha Dalhousie University ha Halifax, Nova Scotia ngan pangulo han klinikal ngan sayantipiko nga dibisyon han Canadian Diabetes Association nga an pagsaliksik in aada pa ha iya sayo nga mga adlaw.
mt: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and president of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association said the research was still in its early days.
ref: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.

src: Sugad han pira nga iba nga mga eksperto, diri hiya sigurado kon pwede ba matambal an diabetes, nagsisiring nga ini nga mga pinanhibilngan waray paghidabi ngadto han mga tawo nga mayda na daan Type 1 nga diabetes.
mt: Like many other experts, he is not sure that it can cure diabetes, saying that these findings do not help people who already have Type 1 diabetes.
ref: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.

src: Dida han Lunes, iginpasabot ha publiko ni Sara Danius, permanente nga sekretarya han Nobel Committee para ha Literatura ha Swedish Academy, dida han usa ka programa ha radyo nga Sveriges Radio ha Sweden nga an komitiba, nga waray pakakakab-ot hin direkta kan Bob Dylan mahitungod han pagdaog han 2016 Nobel Prize ha Literatura, in ginbayaan an ira mga paningkamot para hiya makab-ot.
mt: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, told the public on a radio program in Sweden's Sveriges Radio that the committee, which had been unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about his 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had given up its efforts to do so.
ref: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.

src: Nagsiring hi Danius, "Ha pagkayana waray kami ginhihimo. Nagpinanawag ako ngan nagpadara hin mga email ngadto han iya pinakasuok nga kabulig ngan nakakarawat hin duro ka makisasangkayon nga mga baton. Ha pagkayana, igo na gud iton."
mt: Danius said, "When I was younger, we didn't have any. I was a messenger and sent emails to his closest friends and received a lot of very personal messages. Now, it's over."
ref: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."

src: Han naglabay, nagyakan hi Jamie Siminoff, an CEO han Ring, nga nagtikang an kompanya dida han diri nababatian an iya doorbell tikang ha shop ha iya garahe-an.
mt: Last year, Ring CEO Jamie Siminoff, who started the company in his garage, was surprised to see a stranger at his doorbell camera.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage.

src: Naghimo hiya hin usa ka WiFi nga door bell, siring niya.
mt: He made a WiFi doorbell, he said.
ref: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.

src: Nagsiring hi Siminoff nga kumusog an halin kahuman han iya 2013 nga pagpakita ha usa ka episode han Shark Tank kon diin an panel han pasalida nagbaribad pagpundo han startup.
mt: Siminoff said he was excited after his 2013 appearance on Shark Tank, where the show's panel of investors offered him a deal.
ref: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.

src: Han urhi nga parte han 2017, nagpakita hi Siminoff ha shopping television channel nga QVC.
mt: In the latter part of 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC.
ref: In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC.

src: Gin-areglar gihap han Ring an usa nga kiha ha kakompetensya nga kompanya ha seguridad, an ADT Corporation.
mt: The Ring was also awarded to a competing security company, ADT Corporation.
ref: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: Samtang usa ka eksperimental nga bakuna in nagawas nga nakapahamubo han mortalidad han Ebola, kutob yana, waray mga medisina nga klaro nga nagpakita nga angayan ha pagtambal han naeksister nga impeksyon.
mt: While an experimental vaccine has shown promise in reducing mortality from Ebola, as of yet, there are no drugs proven to be effective in treating existing infections.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.

src: Usa nga antibody cocktail, an ZMapp, ha tinikangan nagpakita hin saad ha kanataran, pero an pormal nga mga pag-aram nagpapasabot nga mayda ini guroguti nga benepisyo kontra han ginhihingita nga pagpugong hin pagkamatay.
mt: An antibody cocktail, ZMapp, showed promise in trials, but formal studies showed it had no benefit against the sought-after mortality.
ref: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.

src: Dida han PALM trial, nagserbi an ZMapp kumo usa ka kontrol, karuyag sidngon gingamit ito han mga sayantista kumo usa ka basihanan ngan gintanding an tulo nga lain nga mga pagtambal dida hito.
mt: In the PALM trial, ZMapp was used as a control, according to the scientists, who used it as a placebo and compared it to three other treatments.
ref: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: Suportado han USA Gymnastics an surat han United States Olympic Committee ngan ginkakarawat an hingpit nga pagkinahanglan han Olympic nga pamilya para igpasiugda an talwas nga palibot para ha tanan naton nga mga atleta.
mt: USA Gymnastics supports the letter from the United States Olympic Committee and acknowledges the full need of the Olympic family to address the pervasive culture of abuse for all of our athletes.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.

src: Nauyon kami han ginsiring han USOC nga an interes han aton mga atleta ngan mga club, ngan an ira sport, bangin mas maopay maserbihan pinaagi han pag-gios paabante nga mayda mapulsanon nga pagbag-o ha sulod han aton organisasyon, kontra han desertipikasyon.
mt: We were told by the USOC that our athletes and clubs, and their sport, would be better served by a more gradual transition to a new system within our organization, rather than a wholesale change.
ref: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.

src: Suportado han USA Gymnastics an usa ka independente nga imbestigasyon nga bangin makahatag hin lamrag ha kon paonan-o an sugad kadako nga pag-abusar han pag-angay-angay nga maisugon nga iginhulagway han mga nakatalwas ha Larry Nassar nga mahimo diri masabtan hin maiha nga panahon ngan magpahiangay ha bisan ano nga kinahanglanon ngan kaangayan nga mga pagbag-o.
mt: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that could provide answers as to when the extent of the abuse alleged by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have been known and to ensure that any necessary and appropriate changes are made.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.

src: May-ada pareho nga panuyo an USA Gymnastics ngan an USOC — an paghimo han sport nga gymnastics, ngan iba pa, nga talwas tubtob posible para ha mga atleta basi masunod an ira mga pangandoy ha usa ka talwas, positibo ngan ginpauswag nga palibot.
mt: USA Gymnastics and the USOC — the governing bodies of gymnastics and other sports, respectively — have both said they are taking steps to ensure that athletes are not pressured to compete despite injuries, a positive and welcomed change.
ref: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: Ha kabug-osan han 1960s, nagtrabaho hi Brzezinski para kan John F. Kennedy sugad nga iya magsaragdon ngan para ha administrasyon ni Lyndon B. Johnson.
mt: In the 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy and helped him win the presidency and for the administration of Lyndon B. Johnson.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.

src: Dida han 1976 nga piniliay ginsagdonan niya hi Carter ha langyawanon nga palisiya, katima nagserbi sugad nga National Security Advisor (NSA) tikang 1977 tubtob 1981, sumurunod kan Henry Kissinger.
mt: 1976 election, he served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.
ref: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.

src: Sugad nga NSA, ginbuligan niya hi Carter ha diplomatiko nga pagkapot han pankalibotan nga mga karigodigo, sugad han Camp David Accords, 1978; pag-normalize han US–China nga mga relasyon tubtob han urhi nga bahin han 1970s; an Rebolusyon ha Iran, nga nagdara tikadto han hostage crisis ha Iran, 1979; ngan an pagsakop han Soviet ha Afghanistan, 1979.
mt: Like NSA, he advised Carter on diplomatic code-breaking, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalization of US–China relations through the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the hostage crisis in Iran, 1979; and the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan, 1979.
ref: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: An pelikula, nga ginpapagbidahan ni Ryan Gosling ngan Emma Stone, nakakarawat hin mga nominasyon ha tanan nga dagko nga mga kategorya.
mt: The film, starring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, was nominated for all major categories.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.

src: Nakakarawat hira Gosling ngan Stone han mga nominasyon para han Best Actor ngan Actress nga magkasunod.
mt: Gosling and Stone were nominated for Best Actor and Actress respectively.
ref: Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively.

src: An iba nga mga nominasyon nag-uupod han Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing ngan Original Screenplay.
mt: Other nominations included Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.
ref: The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.

src: Duha nga kanta tikang han pelikula, an Audition (The Fools Who Dream) ngan City of Stars, an nakakarawat han mga nominasyon para han pinakamaopay nga orihinal nga kata. Nakakarawat an Lionsgate studio hin 26 ka nominasyon — mas damo kontra han bisan ano nga iba nga studio.
mt: Two songs from the film, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, were nominated for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.
ref: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: Ha urhi nga parte han Domingo, hi Presidente Donald Trump han United States, ha usa ka pamahayag nga ginpadara pinaagi han press secretary, nagpasabot nga malakat an mga sundalo han US tipakadto ha Syria.
mt: On Sunday afternoon, President Donald Trump of the United States, in a statement released through the press secretary, announced that US troops will be withdrawn from Syria.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria.

src: Ginhimo an anunsyo pagkahuman ni Trump makig-istorya ha telepono kan Turkish nga Presidente Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.
mt: The announcement came after Trump spoke by phone with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.
ref: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.

src: Masaliwan gihapon an Turkey ha pagbantay han nadakop nga mga sundalo han ISIS nga, nasiring an pahayag, nga an European nga mga nasud nagdumiri nga paulion.
mt: Turkey is also monitoring the captured ISIS soldiers, who, according to a statement, the European countries are preparing to release.
ref: Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: Diri la ini nagkukumpirma nga ha pinakaminos an iba nga mga dinosaur mayda mga barahibo, usa ka teoriya nga nagsasarang na, pero naghahatag hin mga detalye nga ha kaurogan diri nahahatag han mga fossil, sugad han kolor ngan tulo-ka-dimensyon nga kahap-id.
mt: This is not the first time that other dinosaurs have been theorized to have feathers, a theory that has been gaining traction, but it provides details that fossils have not, such as color and three-dimensional shape.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.

src: Nasiring an mga sayantista nga chestnut-brown an pamarahibo hini nga hayop ha bawbaw nga mayda usa ka luspad o carotenoid nga kolor ha ilarom.
mt: Scientists say the chestnut-brown color of the animal is due to a pigment or carotenoid in its skin.
ref: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.

src: An nadiskobrehan naghahatag gihapon hin panlantaw ha ebolusyon han mga barahibo ha mga katamsihan.
mt: The discovery also provides insight into the evolution of the viruses in bats.
ref: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.

src: Tungod kay an mga barahibo han dinosaur waray maopay-an-pagkahimo nga shaft, gintatawag nga usa ka rachis, pero mayda iba nga mga kinaiya hin barahibo — mga barb ngan mga barbule — nakasiring an mga parasaliksik nga an rachis urhi na nga kauswagan han ebolusyon kontra hini nga iba nga mga kinaiya.
mt: Because the feathers of dinosaurs could not be made to grow in a shaft, called a rachis, but had other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — researchers say the rachis is a later evolutionary development than these other features.
ref: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.

src: Nagsasagdon an istraktura han barahibo nga diri hira gingagamit ha paglupad kondi para ha pagmintinar han temperatura o pagkita. Nagsasagdon an mga parasaliksik nga, bisan kon ikog ini hin usa ka bata nga dinosaur, an sampol nagpapakita hin barahibo hin adulto ngan diri usa ka panit hin piso.
mt: The structure of the feathers is not used for flight but for temperature regulation or display. Scientists say, even if this is a juvenile dinosaur, the specimen shows adult feathers and not a single scale.
ref: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Nagsasagdon an mga parasaliksik nga, bisan kon ikog ini hin usa ka bata nga dinosaur, an sampol nagpapakita hin barahibo hin adulto ngan diri usa ka panit hin piso.
mt: The researchers say, despite being a juvenile dinosaur, the specimen shows adult features and no sign of a soft spot.
ref: The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Usa ka bomba ha awto an binmuto ha headquarters han pulis ha Gaziantep, Turkey kakulop han aga nga iginkamatay han duha nga mga opisyal han pulis ngan nakasamad han sobra ha baynte nga iba pa nga mga tawo.
mt: A car bomb exploded at the police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey, killing two police officers and injuring more than 20 others.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.

src: Nagyakan an opisina han gobernador nga desinuybe han mga samaran in mga opisyal han pulis.
mt: The governor's office was evacuated after officials were exposed to tear gas.
ref: The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers.

src: Nasiring an pulis nga suspetsa nira nga usa ka gin-aaligar Daesh (ISIL) nga militante an responsable para han pag-atake.
mt: Police suspect a Daesh (ISIL) militant was responsible for the attack.
ref: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: Nasabtan nira nga an Adlaw naandar ha pareho gihapon nga basehan nga mga prinsipyo sugad han iba nga mga bitoon: An aktibidad han tanan nga mga bitoon ha sistema nasabtan nga ginduduso han ira kamalamrag, han ira pagtuyok, ngan waray na iba.
mt: They found that all the stars in the system obey the same basic principles as other stars: their activity is determined by their mass, their rotation, and nothing else.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.

src: An kamalamrag ngan pagtuyok dungan nga gin-gagamit para masabtan an Rossby number han usa ka bitoon, nga mayda kalabotan ha agos han plasma.
mt: The rotation and tilt are used to determine the Rossby number of a star, which is related to the flow of plasma.
ref: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow.

src: Mas gutiay an Rossby number, mas menos nga aktibo an bitoon kon may kalabotan ha magnetic nga mga pagbarubalikad.
mt: The more the Rossby number, the less active the sun when there is a magnetic reversal.
ref: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: Dida han iya biyahe, iginkatapo hi Iwasaki hin samok ha damo nga mga okasyon.
mt: During his travels, Iwasaki was greeted with cheers in many occasions.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions.

src: Gintulisan hiya hin mga pirata, gin-atake ha Tibet hin usa ka lurong nga ayam, inmiskapo hin pangasawa ha Nepal ngan naaresto ha India.
mt: He was kidnapped by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a wild yak, abandoned in Nepal and arrested in India.
ref: He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: An 802.11n nga standard nadalagan ha pareho nga 2.4Ghz ngan 5.0Ghz nga mga frequency.
mt: 802.11n standard operates on both 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.

src: Gintutugotan hini nga magin backward compatible hiya ha 802.11a, 802.11b ngan 802.11g, basta la an base nga istasyon mayda dual nga mga radyo.
mt: 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g are backward compatible, provided the base station has dual radios.
ref: This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios.

src: An kalaksi han 802.11n mas makusog hin duro kontra han iya mga ginsundan nga mayda usa ka maximum theoretical throughput nga 600Mbit/s.
mt: 802.11n's maximum theoretical throughput is twice that of its predecessor, 300Mbit/s.
ref: The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: Hi Duvall, nga inasaw-an ngan mayda duha nga hamatong nga mga anak, waray magbilin hin dako nga impresyon kan Miller, nga ginsumatan han istorya.
mt: Duvall, who has two young children, was not impressed by Miller, who was described as a story.
ref: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.

src: Dida han pagpakianhi para hin komento, nagsiring hi Miller, "Damo an ginyiyinakan ni Mike dida han hearing... Nag-aandam ako asya waray gud ako babati han iya ginyiyinakan."
mt: In response to a question, Miller said, "There were a lot of questions Mike had at the hearing... I'm ready to answer any questions he has."
ref: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."

src: "Paniningkamotan namon nga mapaguti an paggawas han carbon dioxide kada yunit han GDP pinaagi hin darayawon nga lat-ang ngada han 2020 tikang han 2005 nga lebel," siring ni Hu.
mt: "We will try to reduce carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.
ref: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.

src: Waray hiya paghatag hin usa ka numero para han mga naiban, nagsisiring nga hihimoon an mga ini base han produkto han ekonomiya han Tsina.
mt: He did not give a number for the dead, saying the toll would be based on the country's economic output.
ref: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.

src: Gin-aghat ni Hu an nag-uuswag nga mga nasud "nga likayan an kadaan nga dalan han paghugaw anay ngan paglimpyo ha urhi."
mt: Hu accused the "developed world" of "shirking its responsibility to lead the way in cleaning up and clearing up the mess."
ref: Hu encouraged developing countries "to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."

src: Dugang pa niya "diri hira angay, bisan pa, hangyoon nga magkapot hin obligasyon nga nalabaw han ira estado han pag-uswag, responsibilidad ngan mga kapas."
mt: "They are not entitled, even if they are, to claim responsibility that exceeds their state of development, responsibility and capabilities."
ref: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."

src: Iginpresentar han Iraq Study Group an ira pahayag dida han alas 12.00 GMT yana nga adlaw.
mt: The Iraq Study Group is presenting its report at noon GMT today.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today.

src: Nagpahimatngon ini nga Waray may makakagarantiya nga an bisan ano nga dalagan han aksyon ha Iraq ha pagkayana nga punto makakapugong han sectarian nga paggira, nagtitikadako nga panalapas, o usa ka pag-us-us ngadto hin kasamok.
mt: This Waray can guarantee that any action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian violence, reduce the death toll, or lead to a stalemate.
ref: It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos.

src: An Report nag-abri hi panginyupo para han abri nga debate ngan an pagporma han usa ka consensus ha United States tungod han palisiya ngado ha Middle East.
mt: The report calls for an open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States on policy towards the Middle East.
ref: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.

src: Ini nga pahayag duro hin ka kritikal han haros kada aspeto han presente nga palisiya han Ehekutibo ngadto han Iraq ngan iya ini gin-aaghat hin madagmit nga pagbag-o hin direksyon.
mt: This statement is also critical of almost every aspect of the current policy of the Executive towards Iraq and its demands a major change of direction.
ref: The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction.

src: Siyahan han iya 78 nga mga rekomendasyon amo an usa ka bag-o nga diplomatiko nga inisyatibo an pagbubuhaton ugsa matapos ini nga tuig para masiguro an mga utlanan han Iraq kontra han makiawayon nga mga panginlabot ngan basi maipahamtang utro an diplomatiko nga mga relasyon ha iya mga amyaw.
mt: 78 of his recommendations were a new diplomatic initiative to be carried out before the end of this year to ensure Iraq's borders against infiltrators and possibly restore diplomatic relations with its neighbors.
ref: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: An yana Senador ngan kanan Argentina First Lady nga hi Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner nagpasabot han iya kandidatura ha pagkapresidente kagab-i ha La Plata, usa nga syudad 50 ka kilometro (31 ka milya) an kahirayo tikang ha Buenos Aires.
mt: Argentina's current Senator and First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her candidacy for president in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.

src: Iginpasabot ni Mrs. Kirchner an iya intensyon para dumalagan ha pagka-presidente didto ha Argentine Theatre, amo gihapon nga lokasyon nga iya gingamit para magtikang han iya 2005 nga kampanya para ha Senado kumo membro han delegasyon han probinsya han Buenos Aires.
mt: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president from the Argentine Theatre, also the location of her 2005 Senate campaign as a member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.
ref: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: Nakagpatikang hin debate an kontrobersiya tungod han sobra nga paggasto ha relief ngan reconstruction dida han gin-agian ni Hurricane Katrina; kon diin pataraw-an ini nga tawag han pipira nga piskal nga mga konserbatibo nga "New Orleans Deal ni Bush."
mt: The controversy over the excessive spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake of Hurricane Katrina; where it is called by many fiscal conservative "New Orleans Deal of Bush."
ref: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."

src: Nakapokus an liberal nga mga pagsuson ha paningkamot han reconstruction ngadto han paghatag han mga kontrata han reconstruction ngadto han ginkukuno-kuno nga mga insider han Washington.
mt: Liberal commentators have focused on the effort to award reconstruction contracts to insiders in Washington.
ref: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.

src: Sobra upat ka milyon katawo an nakadto ha Roma para tumambong han lubong.
mt: 4 million people attended the event in Rome.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral.

src: An kadamuon han mga tawo nga nakadto duro hin kadako nga diri na posible para han tanan nga makakadto han lubong ha St. Peter's Square.
mt: The number of people who will be able to fit into the vast space is not possible for everyone to attend St. Peter's Square.
ref: The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square.

src: Pira nga dagko nga mga television screen an gin-instalar ha magkalainlain nga mga lugar ha Roma para makagkita an mga tawo han seremonyas.
mt: Large television screens were installed in various locations in Rome to allow people to watch the ceremonies.
ref: Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony.

src: Ha damo nga iba nga mga syudad han Italya ngan ha iba pa nga bahin han kalibotan, labi na ha Poland, pareho nga mga setup an ginhimo, nga nakit-an han damo gud nga mga tawo.
mt: In many cities in Italy and elsewhere in the world, including Poland, the same setup was made, which was seen by many people.
ref: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: Ginsusnan han mga historyador an nag-agi nga mga palisiya han FBI para han pagtutok han mga katigayunan ha mga kaso nga masayon masolbar, labi na an mga kaso hin kinawat nga mga sarakyan, nga mayda panuyo hin pagpahataas han kanan ahensya rating han kadaogan.
mt: Historians have criticized the FBI's recent policies for focusing on low-hanging fruit in cases of easy resolution, especially car thefts, which have led to an increase in the agency's clearance rate.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.

src: Nagtikang an kongreso pagpundo han kamalaw-ay nga inisyatibo dida han piskal nga 2005 ngan nagsiring nga kinahanglan han FBI magtoka hin 10 ka ahente ngadto ha adult pornography.
mt: The Congress began hearings on the controversial initiative in the fiscal year 2005 and said that the FBI needs to send 10 agents to adult pornography.
ref: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: Nakahimo hi Robin Uthappa han pinakahataas nga iskor han mga inning, 70 ka runs ha 41 balls pinaagi han pakaigo hin 11 nga fours ngan 2 ka sixes.
mt: Robin Uthappa scored the highest individual score in the innings, 70 runs off 41 balls with 11 fours and 2 sixes.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.

src: Hira middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar ngan Rahul Dravid, nagmulay hin maopay ngan nakahimo hin usa ka hundred-run nga partnership.
mt: Their middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, made a successful and made a hundred-run partnership.
ref: Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership.

src: Pero, katima mapirde an wicket han kapitan nakahimo la an India hin 36 ka runs nga nakapirde hin 7 ka wicket para tapuson an innings.
mt: But, after losing the captain's wicket, India made only 36 runs for the loss of 7 wickets to end the innings.
ref: But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: Umabot hi U.S. President George W. Bush ha Singapore han aga han Nobyembre 16, titikangan an usa ka semana an kaihaon nga tour ha Asya.
mt: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore on the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.

src: Gin-abiabi hiya han Deputy Prime Minister han Singapore nga hi Wong Kan Seng ngan nakighisgot mahitungod han trade ngan terorismo nga mga isyu upod hi Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong han Singapore.
mt: He met with Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong of Singapore.
ref: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.

src: Kahuman han usa ka semana nga kapirdihan ha midterm nga eleksyon, nagyakan hi Bush ha audience tungod han pagpahalapad han trade ha Asya.
mt: A week after a contentious midterm election, Bush addressed an audience on the expansion of trade in Asia.
ref: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: Umabuyon hi Prime Minister Stephen Harper nga igpadara an kanan gobyerno 'Clean Air Act' ngadto ha tanan-nga-partido nga komitiba para marepaso, ugsa han ikaduha nga pagbasa hini, pagkahuman hit 25 minutos nga miting hiton Martes upod an lider han NDP nga hi Jack Layton ha PMO.
mt: Prime Minister Stephen Harper agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to all-party committee for review, before a second reading of it, after a 25-minute meeting on Tuesday with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.
ref: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.

src: Naghangyo hi Layton hin mga pagbag-o ha environmental bill han mga konserbatibo durante han miting upod han PM, naghahangyo para han "masusi ngan bug-os nga utro nga pagsurat" han environmental bill han partido han Konserbatibo.
mt: Layton asked for changes to the environmental bill from the conservatives during the meeting with the PM, asking for a "more thorough and complete rewrite" of the environmental bill from the Conservative Party.
ref: Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative party's environmental bill.

src: Tikang han pagsulod han Federal nga Gobyerno para magliwan ha pagpundo han Mersey hospital ha Devonport, Tasmania, ginsusnan han gobyerno han estado ngan pira nga federal nga mga MP ini nga gios kumo usa ka parayaw nga pangandaman para han federal nga eleksyon nga pagtatawgon hiton Nobyembre.
mt: From the Federal Government's entry into the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the government and some federal MPs are being called a "pre-election stunt" for the federal election in November.
ref: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.

src: Pero nagsiring hi Prime Minister John Howard nga an aksyon para la mabantayan an mga pasilidad han ospital tikang han pagka-downgrade han Tasmanian nga gobyerno, ha paghatag han dugang nga AUD$45 ka milyon.
mt: But Prime Minister John Howard said the action to keep hospital facilities from the Tasmanian government downgrade, giving an additional AUD$45 million.
ref: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.

src: Sumala han pinakabag-o nga bulletin, nagpapasabot an mga pagbasa ha lebel han dagat nga usa ka tsunami an nahimo. Mayda pira ka piho nga aktibidad hin tsunami nga narekord hirani ha Pago Pago ngan Niue.
mt: According to the latest bulletin, the readings at sea level indicate that a tsunami has occurred. Several tsunami events have been recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.

src: Waray daku nga destroso o mga pagkasamad nga iginreport ha Tonga, pero temporaryo nga nawara an kuryente, nga sumala han report nakapugong han mga awtoridad ha Tonga tikang ha pakakarawat han tsunami warning nga igin-isyu han PTWC.
mt: There were no major damage or casualties reported in Tonga, but temporary power outages, according to reports, have disrupted authorities in Tonga from receiving the tsunami warning issued by PTWC.
ref: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.

src: Ginsadhan an katorse nga mga eskwelahan ha Hawaii nga aada o hirani ha mga baybayon dida han bug-os nga Miyerkules bisan kun gin-alsa na an mga warning.
mt: 14 schools in Hawaii near or on the coast were closed on Wednesday despite the warnings.
ref: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: Ginkarawat ni U.S. President George W. Bush an anunsyo.
mt: U.S. President George W. Bush criticized the announcement.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.

src: Gintawag ni Gordon Johndroe, an spokesman ni Bush, an saad han North Korea nga "usa nga daku nga pitad tipakadto han tinguha nga makab-ot an mapapamatud-an nga denuclearization han Korean peninsula."
mt: Gordon Johndroe, a spokesman for Bush, called North Korea's offer "a big step toward achieving the goal of denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."
ref: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."

src: Naporma yana nga adlaw ha Atlantic Ocean an ikanapulo nga gin-ngaranan nga bagyo han Atlantic Hurricane nga season, an Subtropical Storm Jerry.
mt: On this day in the Atlantic Ocean, the tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed.
ref: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.

src: Nagsiring an National Hurricane Center (NHC) nga ha pagkayana diri hi Jerry nahatag hin hulga ha katunaan.
mt: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) said that Jerry was not expected to make landfall.
ref: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that at this point Jerry poses no threat to land.

src: Ginbanabana han U.S. Corps of Engineers nga 6 ka pulgada hin uran an bangin makasulod ha daan na naguba nga mga dam.
mt: 6 inches of rain is expected to enter the breached levees.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees.

src: An Ninth Ward, nga nagkaada hin pagbaha nga sugad kahitaas hin 20 ka piye dida han Hurricane Katrina, ha pagkayana ada ha taga-hawak nga tubig tungod han paglapwas han kahigrani nga mga dam.
mt: The Ninth Ward, which suffered up to 20 feet of flooding during Hurricane Katrina, is now under water again due to the release of the city's reservoirs.
ref: The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped.

src: Naglalapwas an tubig ha dam ha usa ka seksyon nga 100 ka piye an kahilapad.
mt: 100,000 cubic feet of water is leaking from a dam section.
ref: Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: Iginpagawas ni Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden an iya kabudlay han mga pagkatanggal dida han iya pagyakan ha Wikinews han una nga bulan.
mt: Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden has released his frustration with the removal of his edits from Wikinews in the first month.
ref: Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month.

src: "Nagbinuwa gud la hiya [Wales] ha aton tikang han pagtikang. Siyahan, han pag-arte nga kuntaloy para ini ha legal nga mga rason. Ikaduha, pinaagi han pagpakita nga kuntaloy namamati hiya ha aton, kutob ngada han iya arte han pagtanggal."
mt: "She [Wales] has been a thorn in our side since the beginning. First, by her legal challenge to this. Second, by her watching us, and then her challenge to our removal."
ref: "He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."

src: An kaaringit han komunidad nakagdara ngadto han mga paningkamot ha pagkayana para makagpahamtang hin usa ka palisiya mahitungod hiton sekswal nga mga content para han site nga nagho-host hin milyones nga abrido-an-lisensya nga media.
mt: The community has responded to the site's efforts to create a policy regarding sexual content for the site that hosts millions of adult-license media.
ref: The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media.

src: Kaurogan han trabaho nga nahimo teoretikal, pero iginsurat an programa basi tundugon an mga obserbasyon nga ginhimo ha Sagittarius galaxy.
mt: The work is theoretical, but the program is based on observations made in the Sagittarius galaxy.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: An epekto nga ginhihingita han team mahihimo tungod han mga pwersa han taob ha butnga han dark matter han galaxy ngan dark matter han Milky Way.
mt: The team's goal is to measure the effect of the forces between the dark matter in the galaxy and the dark matter in the Milky Way.
ref: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter.

src: Sugad la han pagbunlot han bulan ha kalibutan, nagigin hinungdan hin mga taob, asya gihapon an Milky Way nagpepwersa ha Sagittarius galaxy.
mt: Like the moon's tides on Earth, the Milky Way is also exerting a pull on the Sagittarius galaxy.
ref: Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Nakagsiring an mga sayantista nga an dark matter nakakaapekto ha iba nga dark matter ha pariho nga paagi han regular matter.
mt: Scientists say dark matter affects other dark matter in the same way regular matter does.
ref: The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does.

src: Nagsisiring ini nga teyoriya nga kaurogan han dark matter ha palibot han usa ka galaxy makikit-an ha galaxy ha usa ka klase hin halo, ngan hinimo ini han damo hin duro nga gudti nga mga partikulo.
mt: This theory that dark matter in a galaxy's halo can be seen in a galaxy in a type of halo, made this from many strong particles.
ref: This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: An mga sumat ha telebisyon nagpakita hin busag nga aso nga nagawas tikang han planta.
mt: A video clip on television showed a dog running out of the plant.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant.

src: Nagpahimatngon an lokal nga mga awtoridad ha mga residente ha kahigrani han planta nga magpabilin ha sulod, parungon an mga air-conditioner ngan diri uminom hin tubig tikang ha gripo.
mt: Local authorities have advised residents living near the plant to stay indoors, turn off air conditioners and not drink water from the tap.
ref: Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water.

src: Sumala han nuclear agency han Japan, nahibaroan nga mayda radioactive caesium ngan iodine ha planta.
mt: According to the nuclear agency of Japan, there are radioactive caesium and iodine in the plant.
ref: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.

src: Naghuhunahuna an mga awtoridad nga nagpapasabot ini nga bangin naburit an mga surudlan nga mayda uranium fuel ha site ngan nag-aawas.
mt: Authorities believe the blast may have damaged the site's uranium fuel storage tanks and are waiting for the fire to die down.
ref: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: Nadiskobrehan ni Dr. Tony Moll an Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) ha South African nga rehiyon han KwaZulu-Natal.
mt: Dr. Tony Moll discovered Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region of KwaZulu-Natal.
ref: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal.

src: Ha usa ka paghimangraw, nagsiring hiya nga an bag-o nga variant "duro hin ka makalilisang ngan nakaka-alarma tungod han duro kahitaas nga rate hin kamatayon."
mt: In a statement, he said the new variant "is more transmissible and more deadly than any we've seen before."
ref: In an interview, he said the new variant was "very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."

src: Bangin nakakuha an iba nga mga pasyente han kagaw ha ospital, hunahuna ni Dr. Moll, ngan purlumenos duha an mga health worker han ospital.
mt: Some patients were injured in the blast, Dr. Moll said, and two health workers at the hospital were killed.
ref: Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers.
